Once you've seen Geraldo's naked torso, u cannot unsee it...which means it cd be the last image in your brain right before u die. #PSA

This was 2005, so he was 62 years old. He looked ridiculous, but I remember thinking "The guns on this old man actually put mine to shame."

(3 over 2 because the Saffron arc was genius. 4 got muddled with the whole Operative stuff. The less said about 6, the better)

— Scaremy Jingleghost (@JeremyMonjo) July 21, 2013

@JeremyMonjo fuck you for ending firefly on a bad note!

— Brandon 🚷 (@bnowalk) July 21, 2013

@bnowalk Well, the series finale was good, at least! Practically redeemed the whole season!

— Scaremy Jingleghost (@JeremyMonjo) July 21, 2013

@JeremyMonjo I think season 6 gets too much crap! But shooting Badger (who of course had that amazing redemption arc in S3) was overkill.

— GrahamB (@losthero47) July 21, 2013

@losthero47 I know they needed a shocking death to start off the season, but making Kaylee the one who had to do it was just too dark.

— Scaremy Jingleghost (@JeremyMonjo) July 21, 2013

@bnowalk @JeremyMonjo look, it was meta-commentary on the nature of fame, drawing directly on her heroin spiral post-Bring It On

— Rowan Kaiser (@RowanKaiser) July 21, 2013

@JeremyMonjo Thank you. I maintain that 6 was good, just different, though even I wouldn't defend the Dushku arc.

— Brandon 🚷 (@bnowalk) July 21, 2013

@bnowalk @JeremyMonjo I don't know WHY Mal married her.

— Grace (@GemOfAmara) July 21, 2013

@GemOfAmara @bnowalk @JeremyMonjo He'll marry anyone!

— Rowan Kaiser (@RowanKaiser) July 21, 2013

@RowanKaiser @bnowalk @JeremyMonjo the arc where he got sent to the special hell was GREAT.

— Grace (@GemOfAmara) July 21, 2013

@GemOfAmara @bnowalk I think that was because it the original plan for River, before Summer Glau's contract stand-off in S4 messed it up.

— Scaremy Jingleghost (@JeremyMonjo) July 21, 2013

@GemOfAmara @bnowalk @JeremyMonjo for reals. fuck all the fans who think it broke the canon, it was hilarious and tense.

— Rowan Kaiser (@RowanKaiser) July 21, 2013

@JeremyMonjo The show really lost something when Adam Baldwin stormed off the set yelling about the liberal media and they wrote Jayne off!

— GrahamB (@losthero47) July 21, 2013

@RowanKaiser @GemOfAmara @bnowalk The CG was pretty terrible, you have to admit. (Granted, Tony Head was AMAZING as Special Satan)

— Scaremy Jingleghost (@JeremyMonjo) July 21, 2013
